name: TIFA
description:
This game is my entre for the MiniJam 66, on the theme "Sweet", with the limitation "Only 2 button inputs!".

In this little 2D game, you need to collect as many delicious candies as you can, while avoiding those disgusting vegetables ! But, you only have 2 buttons to control your character in 8 different positions : every time you press one, it switches its axis ! Use T key to move vertically and the Space bar to move horizontally.

This game is made entirely in Visual Basic .NET. I created all the code and some assets, but the credits for the other assets are here :

  • [CC0] isaiah658 : https://opengameart.org/content/isaiah658s-pixel-pack-2
